Text: Thank you!!!! i grew up on this album and the other one they put out.  my pops worked sound for them often.  this album was put out around 83.  they're from va. beach, not roanoake, and the bad fiddle player is Cecil Hooker.  he went on to play with shania (sucks, but he's awesome).  mom ran off with the albums and no way to hear 'em for bout  6 years, so thank very much.

Hi
Thank you for sharing this, i love this music.
Do you by any chance have the other record they put out ?
Although the music is not bad, it has little to do with fiddle playing.Fiddle is in the background only.
